SELECT
log.lid "log.lid", log.title "log.title", logxcomment.lgcommentid lgCommentId, logxcomment.content content, logxcomment.create_time createTime, fromWho.uid "fromWho.uid", fromWho.innerid "fromWho.innerId", fromWho.nickname "fromWho.nickName", toWho.uid "toWho.uid", toWho.innerid "toWho.innerId", toWho.nickname "toWho.nickName" FROM log LEFT JOIN logxcomment ON logxcomment.lid = log.lid LEFT JOIN user fromWho ON logxcomment.fromid = fromWho.uid LEFT JOIN user toWho ON logxcomment.toid = toWho.uid WHERE log.lid = #{logId} order by logxcomment.create_time desc;
